sorular.soru: Which sign indicates a declaration of closure for moped riders?

feedback.metin: Sign C-11 indicates a statement of closure for motorcycles. Sign C-13 indicates a declaration of closure for mopeds, snorfietsen and drivers of disabled vehicles while the engine is running and riders of a speed pedelec. Sign C-14 indicates a declaration of closure for cyclists and drivers of disabled vehicles without a motor.

sorular.soru: Your car and trailer together are 8 metres long. In which situation are you allowed to keep driving like this?

feedback.metin: In the bottom two situations you drive in the right position. In the upper left situation you do not keep enough to the right. You have to use the rush-hour lane here. In the upper right situation you drive in the leftmost lane of three lanes. If your combination car including trailer is longer than 7 metres, you may only use the two rightmost lanes.
